title: Luffy's Perfect Counter Was Foreshadowed
theoryText: The matchup between Luffy and Enel wasn't just lucky - it may have been part of a larger pattern in One Piece where Devil Fruits have natural counters. Some fans theorize that Luffy's immunity to Enel's lightning was one of the first major demonstrations of type advantage trumping raw power, foreshadowing similar matchups later in the series.
author: Various One Piece Community Members

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Discusses the conclusion of the Luffy vs Enel battle

title: Enel Would Be Unstoppable in the Blue Sea
theoryText: Many fans theorize that if Enel had left Skypiea and gone to the Blue Sea before meeting Luffy, he would have been virtually unstoppable. With a bounty potentially exceeding 500 million berries and Logia intangibility combined with observation haki (Mantra), very few characters at that point in the series could have defeated him. Luffy's rubber body was essentially the only common material that could counter him.
author: One Piece Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: Speculative theory about Enel's potential power level

title: Gomu Gomu no Tako Strategy Previews Advanced Techniques
theoryText: Some fans theorize that Luffy's use of the Tako (Octopus) technique and his strategy of using ricochet attacks to bypass Mantra demonstrates early signs of his ability to adapt and think creatively in battle. This could be seen as foreshadowing his later development of more advanced techniques and his ability to counter observation haki users.
author: One Piece Theorists

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: May reference Luffy's future combat developments and advanced techniques

title: Deathpiea and Ancient Weapons Parallel
theoryText: Some fans have theorized that the Ark Maxim's Deathpiea system, which can destroy an entire island, serves as a smaller-scale parallel to the Ancient Weapons like Pluton. This could be Oda's way of showing that even without the legendary weapons, combining Devil Fruit powers with advanced technology can create weapons of mass destruction.
author: One Piece Theory Community

spoilerStatus.spoilerDescription: References Ancient Weapons and their destructive capabilities
